text: Pontocola is a ghost town in Lee County, in the U.S. state of Mississippi. ==History== Pontocola is a name derived from the Chickasaw language purported to mean "hanging grapes". A post office operated under the name Pontocola from 1858 to 1904. ==References== Category:Geography of Lee County, Mississippi Category:Ghost towns in Mississippi
title: Pontocola, Mississippi
